The Questionnaire: Chose Your Starting Monsters!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Questionnaire: Chose Your Starting Monsters!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, August 6, 2000 - 02:13 pm:

The game allows a starting player to be assigned 3 monster cards based on their responses to a 20 question quiz at the beginning, regardless of the difficulty level chosen.
The following 9 are available: Tiger, Naga, Golem, Hare, Suezo, Gali, Mocchi, Pixie, Dino. There are 74 possible combinations of these monsters!
Out of the 400 possible combinations of yes/no responses, here are a few of the results:

Hopefully this will be useful to people just starting out, and those moving from one difficulty level to another!
By Tony on Sunday, August 6, 2000 - 03:19 pm:

Good info Lisa. Did you use a Gameshark for this, or did you just spend a lot of time researching it?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, August 6, 2000 - 04:23 pm:

I took the test about 100 times! I double-checked results, and made certain that everything was the same at all 3 difficulty levels

By Eagle_Fierce on Thursday, August 17, 2000 - 02:43 pm:

You're missing at one combination there, Lisa. Either that, or you have Tiger, Naga, Golem listed twice. When my Dad started, it gave him Tiger, Golem, and Dino. I can't remember what he said for all of the questions, though. my team was Gali, Golem, and Dino, so we just assumed that the questions only changed the first monster. Interesting find, Lisa. You deserve a pat on the back. ^_^

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 17, 2000 - 05:21 pm:

There are a few sets listed multiple times, and there are 74 different combos possible, so I'm clearly missing about 30 .....but it's going to be a while before I add to this list!

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 17, 2000 - 05:23 pm:

This is a great example of research that CAN be done without a gameshark, by the way!
